Function copy_old

boost::contract::copy_old — Query if old values need to be copied (but not for virtual public functions and public function overrides).

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/contract/old.hpp>


bool copy_old();

Description

For example, this function always returns false when both postconditions and exception guarantees are not being checked (see BOOST_CONTRACT_NO_OLDS). This function is usually only called by the code expanded by BOOST_CONTRACT_OLDOF.

See Also:

No Macros

Returns:

True if old values need to be copied, false otherwise.
